name: BattleLand：Warrior vs Monster
description:
Welcome to BATTLELAND!
***Hundreds of hours of exciting game play in single player mode! ***
***Decide your unique strategy and tactics to defeat your enemies! ***
***Fight real players from around the world in arena! ***

Features:
1. Challenge global players in Arena. Keep a close watch on your avengers.
2. Start game with 10 classes, 20 roles, 40 skills and 500+ equipments.
3. There are thousands of strategies but none of them is invincible, find your own way out.
4. Different strategies bring different experiments. Change your character any time and try them all out as you want!
5. 250+ hours game play, 46 trails maps, 100+ monsters and amazing animations!
6. Mercenary market offers thousands of choices!
7. Powerful equipment reinforce/reforge system and skill reset system.
8.Challenging Instance Zones in the Trails Tower! Nonstop challenges to the limit!
9.Regular updates, aim forexcellent experience!
